sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_11413_cicd_test.tst</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>tst</name><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Class Description
 * 
 * @class 
 * @author System Administrator [admin]
 * @memberof x_11413_cicd_test.module:sys_script_include
 */
var tst = Class.create();
tst.prototype = /** @lends x_11413_cicd_test.module:sys_script_include.tst.prototype */ {
	/**
	 * Description
	 * 
	 * @returns {undefined}
	 */
	initialize: function() {
	},
	
	/**
	 * Description
	 * 
	 * @returns {boolean}
	 */
	dummy: function(){
		return true;
	},
	
	type: 'tst'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-28 13:45:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>1b9ed113dbf32300fcf41780399619fc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>tst</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CICD Test Application" source="x_11413_cicd_test">268e9d5fdbb32300fcf417803996195e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CICD Test Application">268e9d5fdbb32300fcf417803996195e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1b9ed113dbf32300fcf41780399619fc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-28 14:44:35</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_atf_step_e17ba99bdbf32300fcf41780399619c6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_atf_step"><sys_atf_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Run Server Side Validation Script</description><display_name>Run Server Side Script</display_name><inputs/><order>1</order><step_config display_value="Run Server Side Script">41de4a935332120028bc29cac2dc349a</step_config><sys_class_name>sys_atf_step</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-28 14:41:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>e17ba99bdbf32300fcf41780399619c6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run Server Side Script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CICD Test Application" source="x_11413_cicd_test">268e9d5fdbb32300fcf417803996195e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CICD Test Application">268e9d5fdbb32300fcf417803996195e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_atf_step_e17ba99bdbf32300fcf41780399619c6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-02-28 14:41:22</sys_updated_on><table/><test display_value="CICD Test 2">e97ba99bdbf32300fcf41780399619c3</test><timeout/></sys_atf_step><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=e17ba99bdbf32300fcf41780399619c6"/><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>e17ba99bdbf32300fcf41780399619c6</document_key><order>100</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-28 14:41:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>2d7ba99bdbf32300fcf41780399619c6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-02-28 14:41:22</sys_updated_on><value>// You can use this step to execute a variety of server-side javascript tests including
// jasmine tests and custom assertions
//
//
// Pass or fail a step: Override the step outcome to pass or fail. This is ignored 
//                      by jasmine tests
//
//  - Return true from the main function body to pass the step
//  - Return false from the main function body to fail the step
//
//
// outputs:       Pre-defined Step config Output variables to set on this step during 
//                execution that are available to later steps
//
// steps(SYS_ID): A function to retrieve Output variable data from a step that executed
//                earlier in the test. The desired step's sys_id is required
//
//  Example:
//
//      // Test step 1 - add data
//      var gr = new GlideRecord('sc_task');
//      // this sample step's Step config has Output variables named table and record_id
//      outputs.table = 'sc_task';
//      outputs.record_id = gr.insert();
//
//      // Test step 2 - access added data and validate
//      // check that the record exists (or that business logic changed it)
//      var gr = new GlideRecord("sc_task");
//      gr.get(steps(PREVIOUS_STEP_SYS_ID).record_id);
//      assertEqual({name: "task gr exists", shouldbe: true, value: gr.isValidRecord()});
//
//
// stepResult.setOutputMessage: Log a message to step results after step executes.
//                              Can only be called once or will overwrite previous 
//                              message
//
//  Example:
//
//      var gr = new GlideRecord('sc_task');
//      gr.setValue('short_description', 'verify task can be inserted');
//      var grSysId = gr.insert();
//      var justCreatedGR = new GlideRecord('sc_task');
//      if (justCreatedGR.get(grSysId)) {
//            stepResult.setOutputMessage("Successfully inserted task record");
//            return true; // pass the step
//      } else { 
//            stepResult.setOutputMessage("Failed to insert task record");
//            return false; // fail the step
//      }
//
//
// Note: describe is only supported in Global scope.
// Use 'describe' to create a suite of test scripts and 'it' to define test expectations
//
//  Example jasmine test:
//
//      describe('my suite of script tests', function() {
//            it('should meet expectations', function() {
//                  expect(true).not.toBe(false);
//            });
//      });
//      // make sure to uncomment jasmine.getEnv().execute(); outside the function body
//
//
// assertEqual: A function used to compare that assertion.shouldbe == assertion.value;
//              in case of failure it throws an Error and logs that the assertion by
//              name has failed
//
//  Example:
//
//      var testAssertion = {
//            name: "my test assertion",
//            shouldbe: "expected value"
//            value: "actual value",
//      };
//      assertEqual(testAssertion); // throws Error, logs message to test step output
//
(function(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual) {
    // add test script here
	return new x_11413_cicd_test.tst().dummy();

})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);
// uncomment the next line to execute this script as a jasmine test
//jasmine.getEnv().execute();
</value><variable display_value="">989d9e235324220002c6435723dc3484</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_atf_step"><sys_atf_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Run Server Side Validation Script</description><display_name>Run Server Side Script</display_name><inputs/><order>1</order><step_config display_value="Run Server Side Script">41de4a935332120028bc29cac2dc349a</step_config><sys_class_name>sys_atf_step</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-28 14:40:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>192b21dbdbf32300fcf41780399619db</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run Server Side Script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CICD Test Application" source="x_11413_cicd_test">268e9d5fdbb32300fcf417803996195e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CICD Test Application">268e9d5fdbb32300fcf417803996195e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_atf_step_192b21dbdbf32300fcf41780399619db</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-02-28 14:40:30</sys_updated_on><table/><test display_value="CICD Test 1">7c1bed9bdbf32300fcf41780399619cb</test><timeout/></sys_atf_step><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=192b21dbdbf32300fcf41780399619db"/><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>192b21dbdbf32300fcf41780399619db</document_key><order>100</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-02-28 14:40:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>704ba1dbdbf32300fcf417803996193b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-02-28 14:40:30</sys_updated_on><value>// You can use this step to execute a variety of server-side javascript tests including
// jasmine tests and custom assertions
//
//
// Pass or fail a step: Override the step outcome to pass or fail. This is ignored 
//                      by jasmine tests
//
//  - Return true from the main function body to pass the step
//  - Return false from the main function body to fail the step
//
//
// outputs:       Pre-defined Step config Output variables to set on this step during 
//                execution that are available to later steps
//
// steps(SYS_ID): A function to retrieve Output variable data from a step that executed
//                earlier in the test. The desired step's sys_id is required
//
//  Example:
//
//      // Test step 1 - add data
//      var gr = new GlideRecord('sc_task');
//      // this sample step's Step config has Output variables named table and record_id
//      outputs.table = 'sc_task';
//      outputs.record_id = gr.insert();
//
//      // Test step 2 - access added data and validate
//      // check that the record exists (or that business logic changed it)
//      var gr = new GlideRecord("sc_task");
//      gr.get(steps(PREVIOUS_STEP_SYS_ID).record_id);
//      assertEqual({name: "task gr exists", shouldbe: true, value: gr.isValidRecord()});
//
//
// stepResult.setOutputMessage: Log a message to step results after step executes.
//                              Can only be called once or will overwrite previous 
//                              message
//
//  Example:
//
//      var gr = new GlideRecord('sc_task');
//      gr.setValue('short_description', 'verify task can be inserted');
//      var grSysId = gr.insert();
//      var justCreatedGR = new GlideRecord('sc_task');
//      if (justCreatedGR.get(grSysId)) {
//            stepResult.setOutputMessage("Successfully inserted task record");
//            return true; // pass the step
//      } else { 
//            stepResult.setOutputMessage("Failed to insert task record");
//            return false; // fail the step
//      }
//
//
// Note: describe is only supported in Global scope.
// Use 'describe' to create a suite of test scripts and 'it' to define test expectations
//
//  Example jasmine test:
//
//      describe('my suite of script tests', function() {
//            it('should meet expectations', function() {
//                  expect(true).not.toBe(false);
//            });
//      });
//      // make sure to uncomment jasmine.getEnv().execute(); outside the function body
//
//
// assertEqual: A function used to compare that assertion.shouldbe == assertion.value;
//              in case of failure it throws an Error and logs that the assertion by
//              name has failed
//
//  Example:
//
//      var testAssertion = {
//            name: "my test assertion",
//            shouldbe: "expected value"
//            value: "actual value",
//      };
//      assertEqual(testAssertion); // throws Error, logs message to test step output
//
(function(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual) {
    // add test script here
	return new x_11413_cicd_test.tst().dummy();

})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);
// uncomment the next line to execute this script as a jasmine test
//jasmine.getEnv().execute();
</value><variable display_value="">989d9e235324220002c6435723dc3484</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>
